text: An la zhi rang yige ren an qi nengli fudan. Mei ren dou jiang huode ziji suo zuo shangong de jiangshang [shan you shan bao], ye jiang zaoshou ziji suo zuo zui'e de chengfa [e you e bao].“Women de zhu a! Jiaru women wangle huo zuo cuole, qiu ni buyao chengfa women. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao rang women fudan xiang women de qian ren suo fudan de zhongdan yiyang. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao shi women fudan women wunengweili de, qiu ni raoshu women, qiu ni kuanshu women, qiu ni ci min women. Ni shi women de baohu zhe, qiu ni yuanzhu women zhansheng bu xinyang de minzhong [zhu].”
